projects.title: Dynamic QR Code Attendance and Firebase Database System
projects.bodyText:
- Develop attendance system by scanning QR code. The QR code will change dynamically to prevent QR code sharing.
 - Students have personal profile to access their attendance and records using Android App.
 - Teacher can access student record saved in Firebase Database by using Python script.

projects.title: Autonomous Mobile Robot
projects.bodyText:
- Develop robot software system using ROS framework. 
 - Designed robot 3D model for simulation.
 - Enviroment mapping in real life. Check out the video.

projects.title: Todo List App
projects.bodyText:
- Simple Todo List App that can add, read and delete list in the app.
 - Using GET and POST method to send request to API.
 - The design includes button, text input and checkmark for client to send request to the API

projects.title: AI Data Classifier
projects.bodyText:
- Using stochastic gradient descent learning method to classify unlabelled data with feature.
 - Split data into train and test. Compute classifier algorithm using train dataset.
 - Review AI performance by using statistical tools.

projects.title: Computer Vision Classifier
projects.bodyText:
- Image processing technique and machine learning to classify knife and spoon.
 - Using image processing technique such as thresholding, morphological operation and edge detection.
 - Then feature is extracted and feed to the machine learning algorithm such as K-Means and Minimum Distance Classifier
